tool_description: The Sourcesprout Language Detection is an ultra simple but highly accurate way to detect the language of a given text. At the moment we support a total of 196 languages. Either submit just a few words or huge texts up to 1000 characters. A confidence score gives insights on how reliable the result probably is.
name: Language Detection
title: Language Detection

api_list.name: /detect
api_list.description: This is the one and only way to go!

required_parameters.name: content
required_parameters.default: Add your text here to detect its language
